title: Suggest `pub const fn` for `const pub fn`

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: A-suggestion-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: suggestions generated by the compiler applied by cargo fix

labels.name: D-confusing
labels.description: Confusing diagnostic error that should be reworked

body:
Currently the error message is not great:
```
error: expected identifier, found keyword `pub`
   --> library/core/src/option.rs:391:11
    |
391 |     const pub fn unwrap_or(self, default: T) -> T {
    |           ^^^ expected identifier, found keyword

error: expected one of `:`, `;`, or `=`, found keyword `fn`
   --> library/core/src/option.rs:391:15
    |
160 | impl<T> Option<T> {
    |                   - while parsing this item list starting here
...
391 |     const pub fn unwrap_or(self, default: T) -> T {
    |               ^^ expected one of `:`, `;`, or `=`
...
940 | }
    | - the item list ends here

error: expected identifier, found keyword `pub`
   --> library/core/src/result.rs:801:11
    |
801 |     const pub fn unwrap_or(self, default: T) -> T {
    |           ^^^ expected identifier, found keyword

error: expected one of `:`, `;`, or `=`, found keyword `fn`
   --> library/core/src/result.rs:801:15
    |
257 | impl<T, E> Result<T, E> {
    |                         - while parsing this item list starting here
...
801 |     const pub fn unwrap_or(self, default: T) -> T {
    |               ^^ expected one of `:`, `;`, or `=`
...
829 | }
    | - the item list ends here

```

It would be better to suggest `pub const fn unwrap_or(self, default: T) -> T {` instead.

_Originally posted by @pickfire in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/76330#issuecomment-687501690_
